verses.verse: Behold, <S%H3303><s%> you are beautiful, my love. <S%H7474><s%> Behold, <S%H3303><s%> you are beautiful. Your eyes <S%H5869><s%> are doves <S%H3123><s%> behind <S%H1157><s%> your veil. <S%H6777><s%> Your hair <S%H8181><s%> is as a flock <S%H5739><s%> of goats, <S%H5795><s%> that descend <S%H1570><s%> from Mount <S%H2022><s%> Gilead. <S%H1568><s%>

Your teeth <S%H8127><s%> are like a newly shorn <S%H7094><s%> flock, <S%H5739><s%> which have come up <S%H5927><s%> from the washing, <S%H7367><s%> where every one of them has twins. <S%H8382><s%> None is bereaved among them. <S%H7909><s%>

Your lips <S%H8193><s%> are like scarlet <S%H8144><s%> thread. <S%H2339><s%> Your mouth <S%H4057><s%> is lovely. <S%H5000><s%> Your temples <S%H7541><s%> are like a piece <S%H6400><s%> of a pomegranate <S%H7416><s%> behind <S%H1157><s%> your veil. <S%H6777><s%>

Your neck <S%H6677><s%> is like David <S%H1732><s%>'s tower <S%H4026><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> for an armory, <S%H8530><s%> whereon a thousand <S%H505><s%> shields <S%H4043><s%> hang, <S%H8518><s%> all the shields <S%H7982><s%> of the mighty men. <S%H1368><s%>

Your two <S%H8147><s%> breasts <S%H7699><s%> are like two <S%H8147><s%> <S%H99999><s%> fawns <S%H6646><s%> that are twins <S%H8380><s%> of a roe, <S%H7462><s%> which feed among the lilies. <S%H7799><s%>

Until the day <S%H3117><s%> is cool, <S%H6315><s%> and the shadows <S%H6752><s%> flee away, <S%H5127><s%> I will go <S%H3212><s%> to the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of myrrh, <S%H4753><s%> to the hill <S%H1389><s%> of frankincense. <S%H3828><s%>
You are all beautiful, <S%H3303><s%> my love. <S%H7474><s%> There is no spot in you. <S%H3971><s%>

Come <S%H935><s%> with me from Lebanon, <S%H3844><s%> my bride, <S%H3618><s%> with me from Lebanon. <S%H3844><s%> Look <S%H7789><s%> from the top <S%H7218><s%> of Amana, <S%H549><s%> from the top <S%H7218><s%> of Senir <S%H8149><s%> and Hermon, <S%H2768><s%> from the lions <S%H738><s%>' dens, <S%H4585><s%> from the mountains <S%H2042><s%> of the leopards. <S%H5246><s%>

You have ravished my heart, <S%H3823><s%> my sister, <S%H269><s%> my bride. <S%H3618><s%> You have ravished my heart <S%H3823><s%> with one <S%H259><s%> of your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> with one <S%H259><s%> chain <S%H6060><s%> of your neck. <S%H6677><s%>

How beautiful <S%H3302><s%> is your love, <S%H1730><s%> my sister, <S%H269><s%> my bride! <S%H3618><s%> How much better <S%H2895><s%> is your love <S%H1730><s%> than wine! <S%H3196><s%> The fragrance <S%H7381><s%> of your perfumes <S%H8081><s%> than all kinds of spices! <S%H1314><s%>

Your lips, <S%H8193><s%> my bride, <S%H3618><s%> drip <S%H5197><s%> like the honeycomb. <S%H5317><s%> Honey <S%H1706><s%> and milk <S%H2461><s%> are under your tongue. <S%H3956><s%> The smell <S%H7381><s%> of your garments <S%H8008><s%> is like the smell <S%H7381><s%> of Lebanon. <S%H3844><s%>
A locked <S%H5274><s%> up garden <S%H1588><s%> is my sister, <S%H269><s%> my bride; <S%H3618><s%> a locked up <S%H5274><s%> spring, <S%H1530><s%> a sealed <S%H2856><s%> fountain. <S%H4599><s%>
Your shoots <S%H7973><s%> are an orchard <S%H6508><s%> of pomegranates, <S%H7416><s%> with precious <S%H4022><s%> fruits: <S%H6529><s%> henna <S%H3724><s%> with spikenard plants, <S%H5373><s%>

spikenard <S%H5373><s%> and saffron, <S%H3750><s%> calamus <S%H7070><s%> and cinnamon, <S%H7076><s%> with every kind of incense <S%H3828><s%> tree; <S%H6086><s%> myrrh <S%H4753><s%> and aloes, <S%H174><s%> with all the best <S%H7218><s%> spices, <S%H1314><s%>
a fountain <S%H4599><s%> of gardens, <S%H1588><s%> a well <S%H875><s%> of living <S%H2416><s%> waters, <S%H4325><s%> flowing streams <S%H5140><s%> from Lebanon. <S%H3844><s%> Beloved

Awake, <S%H5782><s%> north wind; <S%H6828><s%> and come, <S%H935><s%> you south! <S%H8486><s%> Blow <S%H6315><s%> on my garden, <S%H1588><s%> that its spices <S%H1314><s%> may flow out. <S%H5140><s%> Let my beloved <S%H1730><s%> come <S%H935><s%> into his garden, <S%H1588><s%> and taste <S%H398><s%> his precious <S%H4022><s%> fruits. <S%H6529><s%>
